content.rendered: APESEK is a non-profit organization in Rwanda, founded by Mr. Emmanuel Nyandwi with 5 teachers and 3 local nurses. For the past 18 years, it has supported orphans, disabled children, teenage mothers, families in conflict, and victims of human trafficking. The organization’s project aims to improve living conditions in rural Rwanda, with a focus on vulnerable groups.

excerpt.rendered: APESEK, a non-profit organization in Rwanda created by Mr. Emmanuel Nyandwi in collaboration with 5 teachers and 3 local nurses has provided support services for orphans, disabled children, teenage mothers, families in conflicts and those victims of human trafficking for the last eighteen years.
